Class MainMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public final class MainMenu
extends InteractiveState
    Encapsulates the behaviour of the main menu.

    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.04
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame()
              throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Loads the maps VisualList.getSelected() into the GameController and re-sizes the window of the game.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - This is thrown if the window fails to resize to the dimensions denoted by the map file.
